item.description:
Happy Birthday Jim!!!!

Is there a better way to celebrate than with a birthday pub crawl? C'mon out and join Jim, NHC's resident Brit, and friends as he celebrates his 35th birthday!!!

We will be making our way through New Haven's restaurants, taverns and pubs. Schedule to be announce very soon. Last bar of the night will be Rudy's to celebrate with more beer and frites!!!

Pub Crawl Schedule (Estimated times)

Lansdowne will be our 1st stop of the night. It will be their Grand Opening and they will be offering us all kinds of specials and freebies. Depending how the evening goes, we might run late for Prime 16. Feel free to call and find out where we are as you arrive in New Haven!

9:30 - 10:30 - Landsdowne (Crown St)
10:30 - 11:30 - Prime 16 (Temple St)
11:30 - ??????? - Rudy's (Elm St)

Update:
Per Bobby the Manager at Lansdowne:
1. Say you're with Jim's Pub Crawl - NO Cover Charge
2. $2.50 Bud light
3. $5 Jack Daniel drinks
4. other specials upon arrival


Contact - Robyn-Allise
item.name: Jim's Birthday Pub Crawl!!!!
